title: How Much Car Can I Afford? (Hour 2)
description:
Rachel Cruze & George Kamel discuss:

Helping an elderly parent deal with their financial mistakes,

How much to spend on a new car,

Cleaning up a financial mess,

What to do with an inheritance.


Support Our Sponsor:

Christian Healthcare Ministries

PODS Moving & Storage


Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6

Learn more about your ad choices. https://www.megaphone.fm/adchoices
Ramsey Solutions Privacy Policy
